main.bio: Hi There! I am a junior at University of Cincinnati (UC) pursuing a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science. I'm interested in using my skills at the intersection of innovation and technology. My current research interests revolve around machine learning, with a particular focus on natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV). In my free time, I can be found trying different coffee shops, reading books, or taking nature walks.
